mapper.select: SELECT midx, id, nick_name, membername, birthday, gender, phone, join_date, mileage, grade, del_yn, blacklist_yn, follower_cnt, post_code, addr, profile_system FROM member WHERE midx = #{midx}
SELECT midx FROM member WHERE midx = #{midx} AND pass = SHA2(#{pass},512)
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET pass = SHA2(#{pass},512) WHERE midx = #{midx}
UPDATE member SET post_code = #{post_code}, addr = CONCAT(#{addr1}," ",#{addr2}) WHERE midx = #{midx}

UPDATE member SET id = #{id}, nick_name = #{nick_name}, gender = #{gender}, phone = CONCAT(#{phone1},"-",#{phone2},"-",#{phone3}), addr = CONCAT(#{addr1}," ",#{addr2}), profile_origin = #{profile_origin}, profile_system = #{profile_system} WHERE midx = #{midx}
mapper.select: SELECT olidx, title, price, cnt, delivery_charge, img_system, buying_date, progress, delivery_status, review_registration, spidx FROM order_list WHERE midx = #{midx} ORDER BY buying_date DESC

SELECT olidx, title, price, cnt, delivery_charge, img_system, buying_date, progress, delivery_status, review_registration, spidx FROM order_list WHERE midx = #{midx}
AND 1 = 1
AND progress = "결제완료"
AND progress = "배송준비중"
AND progress = "배송중"
AND progress = "배송완료"
ORDER BY buying_date DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM order_list WHERE progress = #{progress} AND midx = #{midx}
SELECT cbidx, img_system, title FROM community_board WHERE midx = #{midx} AND del_yn = "N" AND img_origin is not null ORDER BY cbidx DESC

SELECT M.midx, O.olidx, O.title, O.cnt, O.free_delivery, O.progress, O.img_origin, O.buying_date, O.review_registration, O.spidx, O.ordernumber, M.membername, M.addr, M.phone, O.memo FROM order_list O INNER JOIN member M ON M.midx = O.midx WHERE O.spidx = #{spidx} AND M.midx = #{midx}

SELECT B.title, B.writer, B.reply_cnt, B.hit_cnt, B.img_system, B.img_origin, B.cbidx, R.write_date, R.content FROM community_board B INNER JOIN community_reply R ON B.cbidx = R.cbidx WHERE R.midx = #{midx} AND R.del_yn = "N" ORDER BY R.write_date DESC

SELECT Q.content, Q.write_date, Q.del_yn, P.title, P.brand, P.img_system, P.img_origin, Q.spidx, Q.answer_content, Q.answer FROM shopping_product P INNER JOIN shopping_QnA Q ON Q.spidx = P.spidx WHERE Q.midx = #{midx} AND Q.del_yn = "N" ORDER BY Q.write_date DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM shopping_review WHERE midx = #{midx}

SELECT R.content, R.write_date, R.del_yn, P.title, P.img_system, P.img_origin, R.spidx, R.sridx, R.score FROM shopping_review R INNER JOIN shopping_product P ON R.spidx = P.spidx WHERE R.midx = #{midx} AND R.del_yn = "N" ORDER BY R.write_date DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM follow WHERE midx = #{midx}
SELECT count(*) FROM follow WHERE fmidx = #{fmidx}
SELECT M.profile_origin, M.profile_system, M.nick_name, F.midx, M.midx, F.fmidx FROM member M INNER JOIN follow F ON M.midx = F.midx WHERE F.fmidx = #{fmidx} ORDER BY F.add_date DESC
SELECT F.midx, M.midx, F.fmidx, M.nick_name, M.profile_system FROM follow F LEFT OUTER JOIN member M ON F.fmidx = M.midx WHERE F.midx = #{midx} ORDER BY add_date desc
